entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
